other_tests.findings: Positive for group D Salmonella species, ceftriaxone-susceptible.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Positive blood cultures for the same Salmonella serovar occurred multiple times over 18 months despite repeated antibiotic treatments.

other_tests.findings: Pericardial effusion analysis consistent with sterile reactive fluid.
Normal complete blood count, normal immunoglobulin levels, normal complement levels, and lymphocyte function. Diminished IL-12R b1 expression was noted.
All isolates had identical DNA fingerprints indicating the same serovar.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Indicated that all 6 episodes of bacteremia originated from the same serovar.
